entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being led away from Dumbledore's side by Ginny.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is lying on the ground and Harry does not want to leave his side.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid's hand is on Harry's shoulder, trembling.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny leads Harry back into the castle with a smaller and warmer hand.

relationships.description: Harry is being led away from Dumbledore's side.
Hagrid's hand is on Harry's shoulder.
Ginny leads Harry back into the castle.
